p: The antioxidant activity produced at 0.1 or 1 mg/mL of the essential oil of S. macrostema is greater that the activity reported for the essential oil of diverse medicinal plants from Lamiaceae ( Thymus vulgaris, M. officinalis, Pogostemon cablin and Rosmarinus officinalis), which showed antioxidant activity >50% at 3 mg/mL.[ 39 40 41]
